title: Toy Story
short_plot_summary: A cowboy doll named Woody is threatened by the arrival of a new spaceman action figure, Buzz Lightyear. As they try to find their way back to their owner, Andy, they form an unlikely friendship.
explanation: A cowboy, representing Woody, the main character
An astronaut, representing Buzz Lightyear, the other main character
A dinosaur, representing Rex, one of the toy characters
A pig, representing Hamm, another toy character
A pizza, referencing Pizza Planet, a key location in the movie
